text: Share to compare notes with your teammates!
1. As your group compares observations, the Presenter can combine everyone's findings on their Share Workspace Section to present or publish to the Class Work.
2. After you have agreed on your summary findings, refine your work by thinking about different types of evidence of Eastern deciduous forests:

• What did you expect to find that you did not see?
  • What did you see that you didnâ€™t list in Get Started?
  • What did you observe that isn't actually part of a forest ecosystem?
Is there anything you want to add to your final presentation to the class?

3. If you still have more time, discuss and list what you might expect to see looking different four weeks from now. What will cause these changes? Your Recorder can list all your ideas to share with the class.

Encourage your students to work together using the Group View (upper right) and Share switch. They can copy items from each others documents by dragging. Then have them try publishing to the Class Work tab to share their posters.
